name: H.O.M.E. Is Where The H.E.A.R.T. Is
name_original: H.O.M.E. Is Where The H.E.A.R.T. Is
description:
H.O.M.E. Is Where The H.E.A.R.T. Is 

A Space Station's AI must make use of various robot shells to make its way off of the station and find it's way home... whatever that may be.

This game was create in 48 hour during the 2019 Global Game Jam. Our theme for that year was Home, which developer had to create a game basic around the word home.
